text:
@kayleighmcenany @realDonaldTrump Fact: 6,200 per the Fire Marshall
Fact: Access was not blocked by protesters.
FACT: He was SERIOUS about slowing down coronavirus testing. 
Fact: When proving you can drink a glass of water with one hand is the highlight of your speech you're in trouble.
